GeneDef.label: giantman
GeneDef.description: The Giantman can alter their size at will, along with the size of all their equipment. They can become a massive being capable of crushing people underfoot or a being so small it's almost impossible to see them.\n\nWARNING: Rimworld pathfinding, combat, and graphics tend to expect pawns to be a certain size. You will likely not have any game-breaking issues, but if one of your pawns starts acting funny, first save and reload. If that doesn't work revert them to normal size, followed by a save and reload. If that doesn't work, then I don't really have any other ideas because size shouldn't be a factor anymore.

GeneDef.label: become microscopic
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are able to become 1% size, reducing melee damage, hunger rate, and any stat related to size. This will also increase melee dodge chance, and reduce the perceived danger of this pawn when calculating raid size.\n\nWARNING: Becoming this small may have unforseen consequences. All I can guarantee is that this will change your size.
